entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
